title: Push Notifications(App News & Announcements/Ticket & Event Info)
custom_steps:
Homebase Instructions

To send a General app & news Ballpark notifications from Homebase:
1. Choose New-->Notification Ballpark from the item picker located at the bottom of the page
2. Type an internal name
3. Ensure that Ballpark Notification is selected from the Notification Type drop down
4. Type in a Notification message
5. Click on 'To Beta' or 'To Prod' *Not to prod will still send to qa. 

To send team specific notifications from Homebase:
1. Choose New-->Notification Ballpark from the item picker located at the bottom of the page
2. Type an internal name
3. Ensure that Ballpark Notification is selected from the Notification Type drop down
4. Type in a Notification message
5. Click on 'To Beta' or 'To Prod' *Not to prod will still send to qa.

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user has logged into Ballpark for the first time
AND the user has not chosen a favorite team
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then when the user gets to the Set Notification page during the onboard flow notifications, Sound, and App News & Announcements should be automatically enabled
AND no teams should have notifications enabled

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user has logged into Ballpark for the first time
AND the user has chosen a favorite team(s)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then when the user gets to the Set Notification page during the onboard flow
Then notifications, Sound, and App News & Announcements should be automatically enabled
AND the favorite team(s) will be on top of the teams list 
AND notification will be enabled for that team(s)

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a user is in the Ballpark app
AND goes to Settings->Set Notifications page
AND makes changes to the notifications settings and then backs out of the Set Notifications page
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then when the user goes back to Set Notifications page the changes previously made will have been retained

custom_steps_separated.content:
When App News & Announcements notification setting is enabled
AND from home base we send a general notification
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then we will receive the general notification
And opening that notification will open Ballpark

custom_steps_separated.content:
When you have a favorite team(s) selected
And you have notifications enabled for that team(s)
And from home base we send a team specific notification
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then we will receive the notification for only the team we subscribed to
And tapping on the notification will bring you to the Tickets dashboard of that team

custom_steps_separated.content:
When you have a favorite team(s) selected
And you do NOT have notifications enabled for that team(s)
And from home base we send a team specific notification
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then we will not receive any notifications for that team(s)

custom_steps_separated.content:
When we go to Settings->Set Notifications page
AND we enable notifications for any team that is not your favorite team
And from home base we send a team specific notification for that team
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then we will receive the notification for that team we just enabled notifications for
And tapping on the notification will bring you to the Tickets dashboard of that team

custom_steps_separated.content: When delete one of our favorite teams who also had notifications enabled for
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then when we look at that team in the Set Notifications page they will still have notifications enabled

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the device is in stand by
AND we receive a team or general notification
AND we tap on the notification
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN we will be taken to the team's ticket dashboard(if it was a team notification)
OR we will be taken to the last view you were on(if it was a general notification)
